Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_alpoffset, offset for DM/NR alpha

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_rgngain
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_rgngain, normalized 16 as 1

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_cordifmod
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_cordifmod , 0: use max dir dif as cordif, 1: use max3x3-min3x3 as cordif

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_fltthd00
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_fltthd00, block flat threshold0 for block average difference when gbs is small

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_fltthd01
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_fltthd01, block flat threshold1 for block average difference when gbs is small

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_fltthd10
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_fltthd10, block flat threshold0 for block average difference when gbs is larger

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_fltthd11
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_fltthd11, block flat threshold1 for block average difference when gbs is larger

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_varthd00
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_varthd00, block variance threshold0 (>=) when gbs is small

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_varthd01
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_varthd01, block variance threshold1 less or equal than when gbs is small

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_varthd10
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_varthd10, block variance threshold0 (>=) when gbs is larger

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_varthd11
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_varthd11, block variance threshold1 less or equal than when gbs is larger

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_edgethd0
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_edgethd0, block edge threshold less or equal than when gbs is small

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_edgethd1
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_edgethd1, block edge threshold less or equal than when gbs is larger

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_difthd0
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_difthd0, block dif threshold less or equal than when gbs is small

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_difthd1
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_difthd1, block dif threshold less or equal than when gbs is larger

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_avgthd0
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_avgthd0, block average threshold (>=) when gbs is small

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_avgthd1
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_avgthd1, block average threshold less or equal than when gbs is larger

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_avgdifthd
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_avgdifthd , block average dif threshold(less than) between cur and up block for flat block

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_vardifthd
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_vardifthd, block variance dif threshold(>=) between cur and up block

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_varthd2
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_varthd2, block variance threshold (>=) for edge block detect

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_edgethd2
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_edgethd2, block edge threshold (>=)

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_difthd2
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_difthd2, block dif threshold (>=)

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_ldifoob
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_ldifoob,pre-defined large dif when pixel out of block

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_bdifoob
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_bdifoob, pre-defined block dif when pixel out of block

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_fltalp
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_fltalp,pre-defined alpha for dm and nr blending when block is flat with mos

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_fltminbdif
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_fltminbdif, pre-defined min block dif for dm filter when block is flat with mos

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_difnormgain
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_difnormgain, gain for pixel dif normalization for dm filter.

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_difnormen
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_difnormen , enable pixel dif normalization for dm filter

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_difupden
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_difupden , enable block dif update using max of left,cur,right difs

Control.name: reg_dnr_dm_sdiflut0
Control.desc: reg_dnr_dm_sdiflut0, normally 0-16
